title: Optimize Storage Bins via Consolidation
description: To create space, a warehouse manager wants to consolidate partially filled storage bins of the same item into fewer bins.

tasks.description: Run a report to identify all items that exist in multiple, partially-filled bins.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of candidate items for consolidation.

tasks.description: Select an item from the list and create a consolidation task.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a series of moves to consolidate the items into a single bin.

tasks.description: Assign the task to an operator to physically move the items and confirm the moves in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: An operator completes the moves, and the system shows the inventory consolidated and bins freed up.
